error.httpNotFound: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.
error.accessDenied: You do not have permission to access.
error.badRequest: The request you made is invalid. Please check the entered data.
error.conflict: There is a conflict with the current request. Please try again.
error.gone: The resource you are trying to access is no longer available.
error.lengthRequired: The request requires a content length. Please include the content length.
error.locked: The resource you are trying to access is currently locked.
error.methodNotAllowed: The request method is not allowed. Please check the correct method.
error.notAcceptable: The requested content is not acceptable. Please check the content type.
error.preconditionFailed: The preconditions for the request failed. Please check the conditions.
error.preconditionRequired: The request requires preconditions. Please check the required conditions.
error.serviceUnavailable: The service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
error.tooManyRequests: Too many requests have been made in a short time. Please wait and try again later.
error.unauthorized: You need to log in to access this page.
error.unprocessableEntity: The request cannot be processed. Please check the entered data.
error.unsupportedMediaType: The media type is unsupported. Please check the supported media type.
error.expiredToken: Your token has expired. Please log in again.
error.notLoggedIn: You are not logged in, Please login to get access to this route.
error.userNoLongerExists: The user that belongs to this token does no longer exist.
error.passwordChanged: User recently changed his password. Please login again.
error.accessDeniedRoute: You are not allowed to access this route.

validation.noCategoryFound: No category found for this id: %s
validation.subcategoriesNotBelongToCategory: Subcategories do not belong to the specified category
validation.priceAfterDiscountLower: Price after discount must be lower than the original price
validation.userNameTooShort: User name is too short, it must be at least 3 characters
validation.emailAlreadyInUse: This email is already in use
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.currentPasswordRequired: You must enter your current password
validation.noUserFoundForId: No user found for this ID
validation.incorrectCurrentPassword: The current password you entered is incorrect
validation.invalidPhoneNumber: Invalid phone number. Only Egyptian and Saudi numbers are accepted
validation.passwordRequirements: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
validation.eitherEmailOrPhoneRequired: Either email or phone is required.
validation.userAlreadyExists: User already exists with this email or phone.
validation.emailAlreadyExists: This email is already in use.
validation.phoneAlreadyExists: This phone number is already in use.
